about_the_game:
Eternity: The Last Unicorn Official Digital Artbook


Open this artbook and journey to the fantastical kingdom of Alfheim! Get more insight into the creatures, characters, items and locations from Eternity: The Last Unicorn. Inside we mix illustrations and scenes from the game as well as exclusive images and models with detailed descriptions.
detailed_description:
Eternity: The Last Unicorn Official Digital Artbook


Open this artbook and journey to the fantastical kingdom of Alfheim! Get more insight into the creatures, characters, items and locations from Eternity: The Last Unicorn. Inside we mix illustrations and scenes from the game as well as exclusive images and models with detailed descriptions.

name: Eternity: The Last Unicorn - Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Windows
  • Processor: Intel Atom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
  • Sound Card: Any sound card.
  • Additional Notes: PDF file only.
